```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo=T,warning=F, message = F)
library(recharts)
# devtools::install_github("yihui/recharts")
library(tidyverse)
library(plotly)
```

### scatterplot
```{r}
echart(iris, ~Sepal.Length, ~Sepal.Width, series = ~Species)
```

### modify the plot 
```{r}
g <- echart(mtcars, wt, mpg, factor(am, labels=c('Automatic', 'Manual')))
g
```

### modify theme etc
```{r}
g %>% setSeries(series=2, symbolSize=8, symbolRotate=30) %>% addMarkLine(data=data.frame(type='average', name1='Avg')) %>%
  addMarkPoint(series=1, data=data.frame(type='max', name='Max')) %>% setTheme('dark', calculable=TRUE)
```

### 3D graph in html
```{r}
plot_ly(data=iris, x=~Sepal.Length, y=~Sepal.Width, z=~Petal.Length, 
             color=~Species, symbols=c(0,1), type="scatter3d", mode="markers")
```
